views.markdown: Find me on Twitter @CPDigiDarkroom anytime.Configure options from Settings.See larger Screenshots below..

Changed the tint used in some settings pages which were hard to read.
Fixed a dock issue which appeared on limited devices.

Fix for dock background sometimes not hiding. Adjustments to the DRM

Fixes in settings for iPads
Fixed some control center elements on hiding
Other minor fixes
Revamped Settings Panels
Fixed Yahoo logo not hiding in NC
Added features to the music application
Bug Fixes
Fixed Slide To Unlock Being Hidden By Default

Fixed Lockscreen Bounce Not disabling
Added hiding only docked icon labels

Bug fixes in Messages app
Other minor bug fixes.

Fixed settings pane crashing on iPads
Added hiding underline for accessibility button shapes
Better hide Newsstand

iOS 7.1.1 Compatibility Updates Fix for dock not hiding on some devices.
Update to settings page.

-Framework for new features coming next version.
Added the request to hide contacts tab from Phone app

Added option to hide folder badges without hiding icon badges
Added option to hide folder titles
Added option to disable wallpaper zoom
Added option for instant slide to unlock text
Attempted fix for reported Location Improved with Wifi Popup not hiding

Numerous Bug Fixes
New Features
Added customization options for LockScreen and Statusbar
More options for SpringBoard, LockScreen and other stock apps
Added Respring Button

Split Battery Icon and Percent As Before
Added more LockScreen and SpringBoard toggles
Redid Settings Panel for more organized appearance
